Articles.Content: When in map view, the option to select the advanced manoeuvre editor and the advanced orbital info sometimes 'lock' themselves and they cannot be selected. This happens in both sandbox and career, and doesn't always occur (but does most of the time). Is there any explanation to this?

1 hour ago, Ion Forbes said:

When in map view, the option to select the advanced manoeuvre editor and the advanced orbital info sometimes 'lock' themselves and they cannot be selected. This happens in both sandbox and career, and doesn't always occur (but does most of the time). Is there any explanation to this?

I've never experienced this. If you can find a repeatable way to cause it we can confirm it and get it on the bug tracker though.
I've found that if the navball isn't minimized the graphical maneuver editor tab won't be available. Seems odd that the navball would need to be minimized.

38 minutes ago, Moocheen said:

I've found that if the navball isn't minimized the graphical maneuver editor tab won't be available. Seems odd that the navball would need to be minimized. 

My game does not have this issue. Do you have a small screen or high UI size?
I normally run in windowed mode with default UI sizing. But I did try with full screen and have the same behavior. This with the latest patch from 6/12/19.
You need to upgrade your tracking station.
